function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risk of cross-contamination from stainless steel surfaces due to inadequate cleaning procedures and disinfectant application.","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases such as HCoV, TGEV, and MHV.","Mitigation":"Implement thorough cleaning and disinfection protocols for stainless steel surfaces, and ensure appropriate concentrations and contact times for disinfectants.","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technologies such as UV light, electrostatic sprayers, and fogging systems can improve disinfection efficacy.","People":"Occupants of buildings with stainless steel surfaces, maintenance staff responsible for cleaning and disinfecting, public health authorities.","Owner":"Facility management, public health authorities, cleaning and maintenance teams."}]}
